Detailed Description

All configuration Parameters for LDC.

struct vpsissldcCfg

Field Documentation

vpsissldcAdvConfig_t vpsissldcConfig::advCfg

LDC advanced configuration - if isAdvCfgValid == FALSE, driver will compute the advCfg internally

vpsissldcBayerDataFormat_t vpsissldcConfig::bayerDataFormat

Bayer DataFormat, applicable only when Mode is ISSHAL_LDC_MODE_BAYER_CHROMA_ABBERATION

vpsissldcBayerInitColor_t vpsissldcConfig::bayerInitColor

First color for the Bayer format

uint32_t vpsissldcConfig::enableBackMapping

Flag to enable/disable LDC Back Mapping 1: Enables LDC back mapping 0: Disables LDC Back mapping

uint32_t vpsissldcConfig::inputFrameHeight

height of the input frame

uint32_t vpsissldcConfig::inputFrameWidth

width of the input frame

uint32_t vpsissldcConfig::isAdvCfgValid

Are the advCfg contents valid, if FALSE driver will compute advCfg internally

vpsissldcLumaIntrType_t vpsissldcConfig::lumeIntrType

Luma Interpolation Type

vpsissldcLutCfg_t vpsissldcConfig::lutCfg

LDC Lut configuration

vpsissldcMode_t vpsissldcConfig::mode

Mode of the LDC, essentially input data format

vpsissldcPerspectiveTransformCfg_t vpsissldcConfig::perspTrnsformCfg

Affine transformation parameters

uint32_t vpsissldcConfig::pixelPad

Pixel pad (must be greater than 1)
